price: Moses said, “The Lord of the heavens and earth and all that is between them, if only you had sure faith.”
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
